017package squidpony.squidai.astar;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021/**
022 * A graph is a collection of nodes, each one having a collection of outgoing {@link Connection connections}.
023 * Because this works with indexed A*, each node must also have a unique index.
024 * <br>
025 * Many users will be fine with {@link DefaultGraph} as the only kind of Graph they need to use.
026 * 
027 * @param <N> Type of node
028 * 
029 * @author davebaol */
030public interface Graph<N> {
031
032        /** Returns the connections outgoing from the given node.
033         * @param fromNode the node whose outgoing connections will be returned
034         * @return the array of connections outgoing from the given node. */
035        List<Connection<N>> getConnections(N fromNode);
036        
037        /** Returns the unique index of the given node.
038         * @param node the node whose index will be returned
039         * @return the unique index of the given node. */
040        int getIndex(N node);
041
042        /** Returns the number of nodes in this graph. */
043        int getNodeCount();
044
045}
